greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=a(2)=a(3)=1; thereafter a(n) = lpf(a(n-1)+a(n-2)+a(n-3)), where lpf = "least prime factor".
comment: Has period 69, starting with the fourth term: 3, 5, 3, 11, 19, 3, 3, 5, 11, ...
mathematica: nxt[{a_,b_,c_}]:={b,c,FactorInteger[a+b+c][[1,1]]}; Transpose[ NestList[ nxt,{1,1,1},100]][[1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 19 2014 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 16 2010
